summary.para: Modifies the icon displayed for the system language bar menu.

param.name: hIcon
param.para: Contains the handle to the new icon.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

description.para: The system language bar menu does not allow its icon to be modified.

remarks.para: In response to this method, the system language bar menu should call with TF_LBI_ICON to force the language bar to obtain the new icon.

summary.para: Modifies the tooltip text displayed for the system language bar menu.

param.name: pchToolTip
param.para: A string that appears as a tooltip.

param.name: cch
param.para: Size, in characters, of the string.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

description.para: The tooltip string for the system language bar menu cannot be modified.

remarks.para: In response to this method, the system language bar menu should call with TF_LBI_TOOLTIP to force the language bar to obtain the new tooltip text.

summary.para: The ITfSystemLangBarItem interface is implemented by a system language bar menu and is used by a system language bar extension to modify the icon and/or tooltip string displayed for the menu. The extension can obtain an instance of this interface by by calling QueryInterface on the object with IID_ITfSystemLangBarItem.

remarks.para: A system language bar menu is an object on the language bar that supports menu items added to it by third-partyextensions. The system item must support the interface and support the IID_ITfSystemLangBarItemSink identifier in its implementation. The system item should also implement the ITfSystemLangBarItem interface. The system item uses the interface to enable the extension to add items.
